summary:
Just adds a faster and stronger glass bow to skyrim.
AS OF 3/3/13 10:10 I have decided to add a firewolf companion named somtra and more bows!
I have finished the companion and have moved onto creating the new bows.
descriptionHtml:
RELEASING VER 1.0 SOON!(im still adding rooms and stuff to the player home  :p)
This is one of the mods I use when I play skyrim, so I thought I\'d post it on the nexus.
(If ou guys want me to continue further on this mod just tell me because i was thinking about adding more bows to it) also it doesnt have a custom texture.

NOTES:Can be crafted at any forge special forges: can be tempered.
-Its very strong so use at your own risk

INSTALLATION:move the fsgb.esp file into your data folder located in your skyrim directory.

Thanks for checking this mod out and ave a great day!

AS OF 3/3/13 I HAVE DECIDED TO ADD MORE BOWS AND A FIRE WOLF FOLLOWER NAMED SOMTRA.
IM WORKING ON IT RIGHT NOW AND SHOULD BE OUT BY THIS WEEK (or today ).
Thank you for all of the download also!
author: Friedwatermelon
